message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, aiming to provide you with significant value while ensuring a fair deal for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.
